Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.media

Class SeasonController

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.media.SeasonController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/rest/seasons")
public class SeasonController
extends java.lang.Object
Season Controller

This Controller provides basic REST Interfaces to interact with Season entities from the database

Author:
Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

  • Method Details

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SeasonDto> getById​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws SeasonNotFoundException
      This method is used to get a single season by its id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the season
      Returns:
      the found seasonDTO
      Throws:
      SeasonNotFoundException - if there is no season with the given id

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/series/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<SeasonDto>> getAll​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="seasonNumber") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="asc") java.lang.String order)
      This Method returns all seasons that belong to a series from the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the series
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      Returns:
      a list of SeasonDTOs

    • add

      @PostMapping(path="/add", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Season> add​(@RequestBody Season season) throws SeriesNotFoundException, DuplicateMediumException
      This method is used to add a new season to a series
      Parameters:
      season - the season that should be added
      Returns:
      the newly added season
      Throws:
      SeriesNotFoundException - if there is no series with the given id
      DuplicateMediumException - if there is already the same season in the database

    • update

      @PutMapping(consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Season> update​(@RequestBody Season season) throws SeriesNotFoundException, DuplicateMediumException
      This method is used to update an existing season
      Parameters:
      season - the season that should be updated
      Returns:
      the updated season
      Throws:
      SeriesNotFoundException - if there is no series with the given id
      DuplicateMediumException - if there is already the same season in the database
